title: High Grade T205's and T206's For Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: High Grade T205's and T206's For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ryan W
I'm looking to sell some T205 and T206 cards, all PSA graded, and almost all high PSA graded. 

T205 Patsy Dougherty , White Sock Variation- Polar Bear - PSA 3- $70 
T205 John A. Rowan- Honest Long Cut - PSA 6- $750 
T206 Fred Abbott Portrait- Sweet Caporal 350- PSA 7- $ 540 
T206 Nick Maddox Arm at Head- Piedmont 350- PSA 7- $ 600 
T206 Larry McLean Catching- Piedmont 350- PSA 6- $ 230 
T206 Jack Quinn Follow Through- Piedmont 350- PSA 6- $ 220 
T206 Red Murray Batting- Piedmont 350- PSA 6- $ 235

Pictures are available upon request . You should feel free to send me an email with an offer; I've tried to make the listing price consistent with the average price these cards have been selling for on eBay, but in some instances may be willing to negotiate a little . Nic@Wilson5.com. I've also listed some of these cards on eBay, but would prefer to sell them here (in part because there are no sellers' fees), and have priced them slightly lower here than I have on eBay as a result.

posts.post_title: High Grade T205's and T206's For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ryan W
Murray added, more cards on their way back from PSA. Feel free to send me an email, willing to discuss prices, and/or trade.
